name: Flippy Knife Hit - Apple Shoot
description:
Flippy Knife Hit - Apple Shoot
Fruit Land Knife Master Crush

Tap on the screen to move the knife through the moving shapes to hit the Apple but Be careful it;s really hard shape escape game.. If knife hit the shapes you are over. Slash the apples and move forward to next shape the more you go forward the more it will become addictive and difficult to escape.

Be careful to not hit the knife to Shapes.Learn to flip the knife.Become a true master. Time your actions, target carefully and become the knife master!


Tap your way up through the spinning shapes and obstacles, and Hit as many Apples as you can. Simple one-touch game controls make it easy to play, but difficult to master! How high can you fly?

Play this Flippy Knife Hit Game and shoot Apple as much as you can because there are countless Apples in this Fruit Land to crush Fruits and become Knife Master.
